name: DonkeyCorn (Liech)
description:
You are a sad donkey on a farm. The sugar rush of the candy you stumble upon makes you think you're a happy unicorn. You need more.

Developed at the Summer Game Jam 2016 in Mainz by 14 People. After that we polished it a bit, so it is playable and fun.

Warning: might get a little bit too colorful

Downloadable Version is available here:

https://github.com/Liech/DonkeyCorn
